name: The Abacus
description:
An original logic game for your desktop.

A fascinating conundrum, ever changing, always a challenge. The perfect game for small time budgets. A few minutes suffice to solve your daily puzzle game. Then again, maybe you will play for hours.

Four different game modes with varying difficulty will put your logic, your memory and your persistence to the test.

Soothing and entertaining

Successfully playing The Abacus requires observation, logic and mental focus. The game generates a harmonic and soothing atmosphere of meditative peace in the high heavens of reason.

The perfect game to clear your mind after a stressful day. A few minutes of relaxation or an exciting evening in an otherworldly realm. Choose wisely.

Free download and free gameplay

The game is totally free and there are no in-game payments at all. If you want to give your support, please click on the button 'Support the Game' in the game's main menu to follow me on my social media.

But most important .. enjoy the game and the challenge.
